overview: Bang your head with the iron ladies of metal! This collection represents the finest in hard-driving music from women, a frequently overlooked force in rock. Tune in to the raw riffs and melancholy melodies of artists such as Lacuna Coil, Lullacry, Arch Enemy, My Ruin, Lowemotor Corporation, Ram-Zet, Nightwish, The Gathering and Madder Mortem. Blazing their own musical trails, these female-fronted bands prove they can hold their own.
title: Missbehaviour: Women in Metal
